sen.e: To save the chaotic society by Hokekyo, Nisshin wrote 'Risshochikoku-ron' in an attempt to convert the Ashikaga shogunate family to the Nichiren sect (During the era, unquiet days continued as the peasants' uprising of Shocho era and rebellion of the Gonancho force occured); he was incarcerated for the attempted direct appeal (1440).
